identity.name: SteelConnect AI
identity.metaphor: A high-end structural engineering workshop. Clean, organized, tools in their place.

scale.label: text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500
scale.code: font-mono text-xs text-slate-700 bg-slate-100 px-1 py-0.5 rounded-sm

primary.description: Slate 900 - The color of heavy steel and authority.

secondary.description: Safety Orange - Used for primary actions, alerts, and 'Work in Progress' indicators.

accent.description: Blueprint Blue - Used for selection states, active tabs, and information.

usage_rules: NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid, matte colors.
Use 'Safety Orange' sparingly - only for the most important button on the screen or critical warnings.
Data tables should use alternating row colors (zebra striping) for readability: 'even:bg-slate-50/50'.
Input fields must have a distinct border: 'border-slate-300 focus:border-blue-500'.

layout.spacing_system: Generous but dense. Use 'gap-4' for data grids, 'gap-8' for page sections.
layout.grid_system: The Control Room Grid. Dashboard widgets should snap to a 4-column grid.
layout.container_style: Card-based but sharp. 'rounded-sm border border-slate-200 shadow-sm bg-white'.

page_structure.dashboard: Sidebar navigation (fixed left) + Main Content Area (scrollable).
page_structure.connection_designer: Split View: Left Panel (30%) for Parameters (Scrollable), Right Panel (70%) for Visualization (Sticky/Fixed).
page_structure.redline_interpreter: Split View: Left (PDF Viewer), Right (AI Extraction Form).

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-sm font-medium shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-sm font-medium

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-sm shadow-sm p-6

inputs.style: h-9 rounded-sm border-slate-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500/20 focus:border-blue-500 font-mono text-sm

badges.style: rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold border

micro_interactions: Focus rings on inputs must be sharp and distinct.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) for a technical feel.

login_hero.usage: Full height split-screen on Login/Register pages.

dashboard_empty_state.usage: Subtle background or empty state illustration.

universal_guidelines: CRITICAL: All interactive elements MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute.
CRITICAL: Do not use 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Manrope'.
CRITICAL: Radius should be small (rounded-sm or 4px) to convey precision.
CRITICAL: Ensure high contrast. This is an engineering tool, legibility is paramount.
CRITICAL: When displaying engineering values (e.g., '24.5 kips'), use the Mono font.
CRITICAL: 'AI Suggestions' must be visually distinct from 'Verified Values'. Use a purple or blue tint/badge for AI suggestions.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: Manrope, Inter, JetBrains Mono.
2. Update tailwind.config.js with the new colors and radius.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar + Main Content structure.
4. Build the 'Connection Designer' with a resizable split-pane if possible, or a fixed grid.
5. Use the provided image URLs for the Login page.
6. Ensure the 'Redline Interpreter' page has a clear 'Upload -> Process -> Review' workflow.
